briefTitle: A Study of Golimumab in Participants With Active Psoriatic Arthritis
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Trial of Golimumab, an Anti-TNFÎ± Monoclonal Antibody, Administered Intravenously, in Subjects With Active Psoriatic Arthritis
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of intravenously (administration of a fluid into the vein) administered golimumab 2 milligram per kilogram (mg/kg) in participants with active psoriatic arthritis (a chronic inflammatory arthritis that is associated with psoriasis).

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved an American College of Rheumatology (ACR) 20 Response at Week 14
